corse.title: B.E. in Automobile Engineering
corse.titlePera: Bachelor’s  in Automobile Engineering is a four year course spanning over eight semesters. The course aims to provide outstanding engineering temperament & real-time experience, catering the escalating needs of the emerging automobile industry. The course offers a range of sub-disciplines, starting from designing the vehicles to manufacturing components, assembling and testing them for safety. The course deals with the study of various engines and their construction, electrical systems, chassis and body, alternate fuels, vehicle dynamics, system and component design, safety, economics and quality of an automobile.
corse.programOutcomesPera: Automobile Engineers have job opportunities in various fields like automobile maintenance and service, production, research & development and transport departments.With the advent of E-Mobility (e-Bikes, Electric car) a lot of opportunities are accessible for these graduates after completing B.Tech in Automobile Engineering. The students who complete the course successfully can join modern automobile industries like Volvo, Ashok Leyland, Telco, Ford, Hyundai, Maruti, etc. They can also become entrepreneurs by operating service centres for automobiles.

programOutcomesImages.name: Service Advisor and Works Manager in Dealership

corse.eligibilityCriteria: 10+2 with Physics and Mathematics as compulsory subjects along with one of the following subjects: Chemistry / Biotechnology / Computer Science / Biology with at least 45% marks in the aggregate.

laboratories.title: Automobile Engine Lab
laboratories.subTitle: Equipped with
laboratories.pera: SI Engine Test Bench/CI Engine Test Bench/4 Stroke Diesel Engine/4 Stroke Diesel Engine/SI Engine Ignition

laboratories.title: Automobile System Lab
laboratories.subTitle: Equipped with
laboratories.pera: Gear Box Cut Section/Differential Gear Cut Section/Steering System Cut Section/Single Plate Clutch Cut Section/Breaking System Cut Section

corse.title: B.E. in Civil Engineering
corse.titlePera: Bachelor in Civil Engineering is a four years course spanning over eight semesters. The aim of this course is to create the expertise in design, development and maintenance of civil engineering projects such as buildings, cannals, tunnels, airports, bridges etc. The course offers plan, design and supervision of construction facilities which are essential to modern life like space satellites and launching facilities, offshore drilling structures, bridges, buildings, highways and other transport systems, tunnels, airport, dams, harbors and other infrastructure.
corse.programOutcomesPera: Application of knowledge for mathematics, science and engineering./To design and conduct experiments and analyze data./To identify, formulate problems, understand professional and ethical responsibility./Understand the impact of engineering solutions in global, economic, environmental and societal context./To make use of techniques, skills and modern engineering tools./To apply probability and statistics to address uncertainty; analyze and solve problems in at least four technical areas appropriate to civil engineering./To Design a system, component, or process in at least two civil engineering contexts; include principles of sustainability in design./To gain knowledge of basic concepts in project management, business, public policy, and leadership; analyze issues in professional ethics; and explain the importance of professional licensure.
corse.eligibilityCriteria: 10+2 with Physics and Mathematics as compulsory subjects along with one of the following subjects: Chemistry / Biotechnology / Computer Science / Biology with at least 45% marks in the aggregate.

laboratories.title: Mechanics of Solid
laboratories.subTitle: Equipped with
laboratories.pera: Universal Testing Machine/Torsion Test/Universal Force Table/Paraller Force/Friction Apparatus

laboratories.title: Highway Engineering
laboratories.subTitle: Equipped with
laboratories.pera: California Bearing Ratio Test/Aggregate Impact Test/Ductility Test/Los Angeles Test/Flash & Fire Apparatus

corse.title: B.E. in Computer Engineering
corse.titlePera: The Computer Engineering Department was established in the year 2007. The Computer Engineering (CE) Department offers B. E. programme with intake of 120 students. The department has active research interest in various domains like Machine Learning, Data Mining, Computer Networks and Security, High Performance Computing, Unified Hardware Software co-design etc. It has modern computing amenities equipped with the latest tools and technologies. The department has strong collaboration with many research organizations. The department emphasizes on effective teaching learning process including project based learning using modern tools and technologies.
corse.programOutcomesPera: Student can use the techniques, skills and tools necessary for science and engineering practice. One can navigate the industrial dimensions of computer engineering with the relevant skill sets to pursue lucrative career prospects. Students will be able to design and conduct experiments as well as to analyze and interpret data. One can apply contextual knowledge to assess professional, legal, health, social and cultural issues during profession practice.
corse.eligibilityCriteria: 10+2 with Physics and Mathematics as compulsory subjects along with one of the following subjects: Chemistry / Biotechnology / Computer Science / Biology with at least 45% marks in the aggregate.

corse.title: B.E. in Electrical Engineering
corse.titlePera: Bachelor in Electrical Engineering is a four years course spanning over eight semesters. The aim of this course is to educate the students about the application of electricity, electronics and electromagnetism. Trained electrical engineers design electric circuits and equipment. The course offers to create skill based learning in various area of electricity and its applications like generation, transmission, distribution and utilization of energy, instrumentation & amp, control, switch gear & amp, automation engineering.
corse.programOutcomesPera: Graduate Students in Electrical Engineering will be able to base analysis, problem-solving, and design on core advanced EE theory. They will be able to demonstrate leadership skills in the workplace, to function professionally in a globally competitive world, and to communicate engineering results effectively. Students can take up careers in various fields such as Design, Production, Testing, Maintenance, and power sector.
corse.eligibilityCriteria: 10+2 with Physics and Mathematics as compulsory subjects along with one of the following subjects: Chemistry / Biotechnology / Computer Science / Biology with at least 45% marks in the aggregate.

corse.title: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
corse.titlePera: Bachelor in Electronics & Communication Engineering is a four years course spanning over eight semesters. The course aims to deal with analogue transmission, basic electronics, microprocessors, solid state devices, digital and analogue communication, analogue integrated circuits, microwave engineering, satellite communication, antennae and wave progression. The course offers research, design, developement and testing of electronic equipment used in various systems and also covers the manufacturing of communications and broadcast systems.
corse.programOutcomesPera: Electronics and Communication graduates will be able to apply the fundamental concepts of electronics and communication engineering to design a variety of components and systems for applications including signal processing, image processing, communication, networking, embedded systems, VLSI and control system.
corse.eligibilityCriteria: 10+2 with Physics and Mathematics as compulsory subjects along with one of the following subjects: Chemistry / Biotechnology / Computer Science / Biology with at least 45% marks in the aggregate.

corse.title: B.E. in Information Technology Engineering
corse.titlePera: Bachelor in Information Technology is a four year course spanning over eight semesters. The aim of this course is to get the expertise in the fundamentals of networking, computing and programming systems. Information technology covers wide area in our daily lives from building a spaceship to delivering food at doorsteps. The course offers various courses on emerging topics to equip our students with the latest developments in Information Technology.
corse.programOutcomesPera: Develop an understanding of the currents trends in Information Technology and the modern aspects of digitalization.          To identify, design, and analyze complex computer systems and implement and interpret the results from those systems. To select and apply current techniques, skills and tools necessary for computing practice and integrate IT-based solutions into the user environment effectively. To analyze the local and global impact of computing on individuals, organizations, and society. To apply ethical principles and responsibilities during professional practice.
corse.eligibilityCriteria: 10+2 with Physics and Mathematics as compulsory subjects along with one of the following subjects: Chemistry / Biotechnology / Computer Science / Biology with at least 45% marks in the aggregate.

corse.title: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
corse.titlePera: Bachelor in Mechanical Engineering is a four years course spanning over eight semesters. It offers the detailed study of the principles and problem solving techniques from design to manufacturing to the marketplace for any object. Mechanical engineers analyze work by using the principles of thermal energy, motion and force to ensure the design function safety, efficiency and reliability. The course offers various aspects of thermal engineering to design compressor, condenser, evaporator coil, insulation used in the air conditioner and refrigerators.
corse.programOutcomesPera: Student would apply the knowledge of various areas of mechanical engineering to the solution of complex engineering problems./Students will be able to figure out intricate engineering problems relevant to mechanical engineering and design system components or processes that meet the specified needs related to safety and environmental considerations./Creation, selection and application of appropriate techniques of mechanical engineering to predict and model complex engineering challenges with an understanding of the limitations.
corse.eligibilityCriteria: 10+2 with Physics and Mathematics as compulsory subjects along with one of the following subjects: Chemistry / Biotechnology / Computer Science / Biology with at least 45% marks in the aggregate.

corse.title: B.Sc in Chemistry
corse.titlePera: B.Sc. Chemistry is an undergraduate three-year programme that is divided into six semesters. Chemistry strives to enrich and expand and it also strives society to prepare the students to live and work in scientifically and challenging demanding global environment. We want to develop curiosity among the students in the broad field of chemistry and find the practical applications of theory portions in day to day life. The programme focuses on area like Inorganic and Organic Chemistry, Physical Chemistry and more.
corse.programOutcomesPera: After completion of this course, students will demonstrate an understanding of major concepts in all disciplines of chemistry. Students will employ critical thinking and the scientific method to design, carry out, record and analyze the results of chemical experiments and get an awareness of the impact of chemistry on the environment, society, and other cultures outside the scientific community. The employment areas for the B.Sc. chemistry graduates include pharmaceutical industries, chemical manufactures, forensic science department, plastic industries, agro industries etc. Apart from these they are also recruited in the field such as oil, gas and power sectors and defence services. Students can continue their studies after this course by pursuing a master's degree.
corse.eligibilityCriteria: 12 th Science with mandatory subjects being Physics, Chemistry and third subjects being Mathematics or Biology or both

laboratories.title: Chemistry Lab -1
laboratories.subTitle: Equipped with
laboratories.pera: Distilled water assembly/Weighing machine/Glass ware/Plastic ware/Chemicals

corse.title: B.Sc. Microbiology
corse.titlePera: B.Sc. Microbiology is an undergraduate three-year programme that is divided into six semesters.  Microbiology is the science of microorganisms, with a focus on bacteria, viruses, fungi, and protozoan parasites. This course is mainly concerned with microorganisms and their applications in research. Microbiology is a branch of biology that includes molecular biology, inheritance biology, and immunology. Microbiologists are expected to conduct the studies in order to defeat infectious diseases in the future, as well as to realize the role of microbes in the environment and to harness them for food processing, biotechnological, and industrial applications.
corse.programOutcomesPera: Students seeking a B.Sc. in Microbiology will also be qualified for international education, jobs and government agencies to employ microbiology graduates for various positions. Healthcare companies, forensic science labs, environmental agencies, higher education institutions, dairy, food and beverage, government subsidized research organizations, pharmaceuticals, and many other sectors will be benefited from a microbiology degree holder.

programOutcomesImages.name: Food Security and testing Lab technician

corse.eligibilityCriteria: 12 th Science with mandatory subjects being Physics, Chemistry and third subjects being Mathematics or Biology or both

corse.title: B.Sc. Zoology
corse.titlePera: B.Sc. Zoology is an undergraduate three-year programme that is divided into six semesters. It is a branch of Biology that deal with complete details of an animal kingdom, their structure, evolution, classification,  habits,  physiological process, distribution their life and genetic structure.
corse.programOutcomesPera: Students who pursue this course can have many opportunities in the field of wildlife, their conservation, environmental management, ecosystem monitoring, animal welfare, pharmaceutical, laboratories, agricultural farm, museum, government job like Range forest officers, Scientific officer, marine science, fishery biologist and hatcheries. B.sc. in Zoology course has a great future ahead. There are many colleges, institutes and universities providing further master degree courses in specialization which are career orienting and open many job opportunities after completing it.
corse.eligibilityCriteria: 12 th Science with mandatory subjects being Physics, Chemistry and third subjects being Mathematics or Biology or both

corse.title: B.Sc. Physics
corse.titlePera: B.Sc. Physics is an undergraduate three-year programme that is divided into six semesters. This programme deals with complete details of Mechanics, Waves and Optics, Electricity  and magnetism, digital systems and applications, thermal physics, quantum mechanics, and statistical mechanics.
corse.programOutcomesPera: After completing BSc physics, various employment options become available in industrial field, defence field (DRDO) and technical field (ISRO) and teaching field in sciences and some time they can join medical field also. Also students can continue their studies after this course by pursuing a master's degree in Electronics, Condense matter physics, Nuclear physics, Space science, Forensic science etc.
corse.eligibilityCriteria: 12 th Science with mandatory subjects being Physics, Chemistry and third subjects being Mathematics or Biology or both

corse.title: B.Sc. Mathematics
corse.titlePera: B.Sc. Mathematics is an undergraduate three-year programme that is divided into six semesters. This program will help students to have better understanding in topics of advanced mathematics like algebra, calculus, Real analysis, geometry and can improve their analytical ability.
corse.programOutcomesPera: After completing BSc Mathematics, various employment options become available in actuarial sciences, statistics, mathematical modelling, computer sciences, cryptography etc. Also students can continue their studies after this course by pursuing a master's degree in Mathematics, Statistics, Applied Mathematics etc.
corse.eligibilityCriteria: 12 th Science with mandatory subjects being Physics, Chemistry and third subjects being Mathematics or Biology or both

corse.title: B.Sc. Biotechnology
corse.titlePera: B.Sc. Biotechnology is an undergraduate three-year programme that is divided into six semesters. Biotechnology is a broad subject of science that blends the study of biology with the study of technology. Candidates gain a more comprehensive and in-depth understanding of concepts in chemistry, cell biology, biology and computer science. The combination of biology and technology allows scientists to put their skills to the test in order to perform genetic testing.
corse.programOutcomesPera: After completion of this course, students may also select from a variety of other interesting biotechnology master’s courses to broaden their horizons i.e. Master in Biotechnology, Master in Life Science, Master in Medical Biotechnologist, Master in Agricultural Biotechnologist and Master in Bio-informatics. The employment areas for the B.Sc. Biotechnology graduates include healthcare companies, forensic science laboratory and Pharmaceutical Industries.
corse.eligibilityCriteria: 12 th Science with mandatory subjects being Physics, Chemistry and third subjects being Mathematics or Biology or both

laboratories.title: Biotechnology Lab -1
laboratories.subTitle: Equipped with
laboratories.pera: Autoclave,-incubator/shaker, -Binocular Microscope/Hot Air oven,-Centrifudg/Electro phoresis,-water bath/Ocullarmicrometer,-Colorimeter/Colony micrometer, Stage Micrometer

corse.title: BBA in Financial Management
corse.titlePera: BBA in Finance specialization is for students who are good for analysis and reasoning skills. The finance department is one of the most important departments in a company, and finding an administrative job in it would be a great career move. BBA in Finance course trains students in making predictions and forecasts about investments and insurance. The course is designed in such a manner that the students gain theoretical as well as practical knowledge of financial components such as Investments, Portfolio Management, Financial Management, International Finance, and Corporate Finance.
corse.programOutcomesPera: To Attaining managerial/leadership roles as students gain in-depth knowledge in banking & finance./Students should be able to show analytical skills in short term and long term decision making./Get numerous jobs opportunities in this domain./The students acquire a professional qualification in banking, MNCs, International company etc./To get an idea of time value of money for any investment decision./It help to assess the capital structure of a firm and state its impact on firm’s profitability
corse.eligibilityCriteria: Candidates must have passed 10+2 or equivalent from a recognized board in India.

branchName: Bachelor of Ayurvedic Medicine and Surgery (B.A.M.S.)

corse.title: Bachelor of Ayurvedic Medicine and Surgery (B.A.M.S.)
corse.titlePera: Ayurved means ‘Knowledge of life’ it is perceived as one of the most ancient sciences.  It is a constitute college of Monark University, Vahelal Ahmedabad. The University is equipped with full bedded Ayush learning Monark Ayurveda medical Hospital. The program aims at developing and nurturing the student’s interpersonal skills, it allows them to develop the competencies vital for their bright future.
corse.programOutcomesPera: BAMS Graduate after completion of their program can serve in 1)The BAMS qualified candidates can be hired both in government as well as private Ayurveda clinics 2) They can also pursue their private practice in the Ayurveda 3) The different areas of employment for BAMS jobs are the Pharma industry, Life science industry and healthcare community 4) They can also become the entrepreneur by opening their own production unit, repackaging unit etc. They may also explore their future in academic institutes after Post graduation
corse.coureDuration: Five Years and Six Months including Compulsory Rotatory internship (1 year)
corse.eligibilityCriteria: The candidate shall have passed 10+2 or its equivalent  examination from any recognized board with Physics, Chemistry, Biology & have obtained minimum 50% marks/No candidate shall be admitted to BAMS degree programme unless the candidate attained the age of 17 years on or before the 31st December of the year of admission in the first year of the programme./National Eligibility-cum Entrance Test (NEET)- It shall be  necessary for a candidate to obtain minimum of marks at 50th  percentile in the NEET for the under graduate programme held  for the same academic year.

branchName: Bachelor of Homeopathy Medicine and Surgery (B.H.M.S.)

corse.title: Bachelor of Homeopathy Medicine and Surgery (B.H.M.S.)
corse.titlePera: Homoeopathy is a science of dynamised micro-Immnunology based on the law of Analogy. It is the System of Medicine which works on the principle of ‘Like Cures Like’ (Similia Similibus Curanter).This system of therapeutics is internationally accepted and is being practised in India through Homoeopathy Central Council Act 1973 passed by the Parliament of India

corse.title: BBA in International Business
corse.titlePera: Bachelor of Business Administration in International Business is a Business management course of three years. In addition, it makes you learn about the multilateral agencies or international business bodies and their role in the foreign trade.  It is a course that gives deep insight about buying, selling and marketing products all over the world. This course plan that prepares individuals to be highly adept with skills to deal internationally
corse.programOutcomesPera: The course teaches participants to be adept with the tricks of the trade and hit the ground running as soon as they pass out./It teaches individuals to get an understanding of various cultures and in turn prepare them to deal with diversity at the workplace/The course enables individuals to be global business entrepreneurs who can strategically cope up with the dynamics of the international trade world.
corse.eligibilityCriteria: Candidates must have passed 10+2 or equivalent from a recognized board in India.

corse.titlePera: BBA in Retail Management is so designed as to give a student a top-to-bottom knowledge of the functioning and supervision of a retail establishment. Students are also trained in direct-dealing with customers including problem-solving and interactions to boost relationships and sales.This course includes the study of retail trading which includes buying, marketing, merchandising, operations, inventory control, personnel and finance. The degree course is a detailed study of topics like retail supply chain management, store location and management, retail customer service, quality, accounting, marketing, and computer technology, etc.

Since the course has a very versatile curriculum involving aspects of economics, marketing, visual merchandising, sales, branding as well as customer support./The sheer number and variety of job roles available for a BBA Retail Management graduate are also great incentives to take up this course.

corse.title: Bachelor of Physiotherapy
corse.titlePera: The Bachelor of Physiotherapy program contains the basic courses like Human Anatomy, Human Physiology, Exercise therapy and Electrotherapy. It also includes clinical courses like General medicine, General surgery, Orthopedics, Neurology and Cardio Respiratory, which will help the students to get knowledge about various conditions to practice Physiotherapy. It is reinforced by skill development courses and research oriented courses with an aim of enabling students to develop their skills and refine them towards the research studies in the field of Physiotherapy.
corse.programOutcomesPera: Demonstrate sufficient understanding of knowledge in Physiotherapy./Able to integrate theoretical knowledge with clinical assessment./Develop the ability to collect history, perform relevant clinical assessment and frame appropriate electrotherapeutic and exercise therapy management for the patients./Demonstrate clinical decision making ability and provide appropriate patient care./Develop effective communication with patients, family, colleagues and students./Promote health education and improved quality of life through the practice of the profession./To carry out research and publications towards upliftment of the field of Physiotherapy./Actively engage in lifelong learning activities./Work effectively in various inter professional collaborative settings like hospitals, Rehabilitation Centres, Special Schools, Educational Institutions, Health and Fitness Centers, Geriatric Centers, Ergonomic Consultant in Corporate Sectors, Private Consultation, Home Care Services, Industrial Sectors, Sports Management, Fitness Consultant
corse.eligibilityCriteria: Hsc (Science) candidates who has been passed with AB or B group in current academic year

corse.title: B.Sc Nursing
corse.titlePera: Nursing is the glue that holds a patient’s health care journey together. Nurses play a pivotal role and ensuring that care and welfare of the society as they personalized form of care that goes on to create the highest form of medical wellness within the community. The faculty of nursing offer a four-year bachelor’s degree program (B.Sc Nursing) and three year diploma course (G.N.M) which is uniquely designed to develop a league of nursing experts with effective skillets which are essential for providing the highest care to the patient. Nursing can be described as both an art and a science; a heart and a mind. At its heart, lies a fundamental respect for human dignity and an intuition for a patient’s needs. This is supported by the mind, in the form of rigorous core learning. Due to the vast range of specialism and complex skills in the nursing profession, each nurse will have specific strengths, passions, and expertise. Responsibilities can range from making acute treatment decisions to providing inoculations in schools. The key unifying characteristic in every role is the skill and drive that it takes to be a nurse. Through long-term monitoring of patients’ behaviour and knowledge-based expertise, nurses are best placed to take an all-encompassing view of a patient’s wellbeing.
corse.programOutcomesPera: Prepare graduates to assume responsibilities as professional, competent nurses and midwives at basic level in providing promotive, preventive, curative and rehabilitative services./Prepare nurses who can make independent decisions in nursing situations, protect the rights of and facilitate individuals and groups in pursuit of health, function in the hospital, community nursing services and conduct research studies in the areas of nursing practice. They are also expected to assume the role of teacher, supervisor and manager in a clinical /public health setting.
corse.eligibilityCriteria: The minimum age for admission shall be 17 years on 31st December of the year in which admission is sought./Minimum education:10+2 class passed with Science (PCB) & English Core/English Elective with aggregate of 45% marks from recognized board under AISSCE/CBSE/ICSE/SSCE/HSCE or other equivalent Board./Student shall be medically fit./Students appearing in 10+2 examination in Science conducted by National Institute of Open School with 45% marks./Student shall be admitted once in a year.

laboratories.title: Midwifery and Child Health Nursing Lab 1
Midwifery and Child Health Nursing Lab 2

corse.title: Bachelor of Commerce
corse.titlePera: Bachelor of Commerce (B.Com) is a 3-year undergraduate program in business. B.Com is designed to impart managerial skills to students while focusing on a particular business area. In the program, the aspirants will learn about the general business principles, and at the same time, study core commerce subjects such as finance, economics, accounting, actuarial studies, business management etc. In the program, candidates are taught core subjects related to commerce and finance. In the three-year duration, the candidates are also given options to choose from a few elective subjects too. The programme is usually spread over six semesters during which the student is taught topics like financial accounting, corporate tax, economics, company law, auditing, business management, etc.
corse.programOutcomesPera: The students will be ready for employment in functional areas like accounting, taxation, banking, insurance and corporate law. The student will develop an attitude for working effectively and efficiently in a business environment. Learners will gain knowledge of various disciplines of commerce, business, accounting, economics, and finance, auditing and marketing.
corse.eligibilityCriteria: Candidates must have passed 10+2 or equivalent from a recognized board in India.

laboratories.title: Computer Lab
laboratories.pera: Computer Centre with Internet facilities has been set up and managed by experienced Computer professionals. We have a very well equipped computer lab with 100 computers for the information &   Technology subject with internet facility.

laboratories.title: Library & Reading Room
laboratories.pera: The college has well equipped library and reading room. It has more than 3827 references and recommended books for the B.Com. Course. Besides, there are periodicals, journals, weekly and monthly magazines, newspapers, considering the need to keep students abreast with latest development in the field of education, science and technology.

corse.title: Bachelor of law
corse.titlePera: The 3-year Bachelor of Law is a postgraduate programme offered by various law institutes and universities in the country. The programme targets various fields of law including labour law, criminal law, contractual law, family law, legal writing and many others. In order to apply for this programme, candidates have to complete their graduation. The 3-year LLB programme is mandatory for those who want to practice law and also for the candidates who want to pursue LL.M or Master of Law programmes. The course offers a broad understanding of constitutional law and its different sections enable law aspirants in understanding the various case studies in the legal history of India. Classroom learning and internships are a part of the programme to impart elaborate education.
corse.programOutcomesPera: Students will possess knowledge and understanding of substantive and procedural law;Students will possess the ability to perform:a) legal analysis and reasoning/b) legal research/c) problem solving/d) written communication in the legal context/e) oral communication in the legal context/Students will understand the exercise of proper professional and ethical responsibilities to clients and the legal system; and/Students will demonstrate the professional skills of collaboration, counseling and negotiation needed for competent and ethical participation as a member of the legal profession. All students will also demonstrate a basic understanding of business fundamentals and be able to read and understand basic financial documents.
corse.eligibilityCriteria: Minimum Qualification Required: Graduation (any discipline) with  Minimum Marks Required (Aggregate) : 45 %

laboratories.title: Moot Court
laboratories.pera: Moot court is one of the most important simulation activities of student’s life cycle. It nurture their research, analytical, drafting, argumentative skills and helps them to have experiential learning. Moot Court Hall by replicating the real Court Room Class Room set up with a seating capacity of 240 to host national and International moot court competitions.

laboratories.title: Moot Court
laboratories.pera: Due to its social orientation, the Faculty of Law is has a designated legal clinic which serves a social; course by taking up legal cases pro bono for the development of the underprivileged classe.

corse.title: Bachelor of Computer Application
corse.titlePera: Bachelor of Computer Application (BCA) is a 3-year UG course that imparts knowledge on the basics of computer application and software development. There are plenty of reasons to study BCA. There is an utmost need of skilled professionals to serve and solve the various problems in the world of technology and IT in India. One of the most popular options to get started with a career in Information Technology, the course gives you an insight into the world of computers and its applications. A BCA degree is considered to be at par with a B.Tech./BE degree in Computer Science or Information Technology. The degree helps interested students in setting up a sound academic base for an advanced career in Computer Applications.
corse.programOutcomesPera: At the end of the three year BCA programme, the students will be able to: Understand, analyze and develop computer programs in the areas related to algorithm, web design and networking for efficient design of computer based system.
corse.eligibilityCriteria: Candidates must have passed 10+2 or equivalent from a recognized board in India.

laboratories.pera: Computer Centre with Internet facilities has been set up and managed by experienced Computer professionals. We have a very well equipped computer lab with 100 computers for the information &   Technology subject with internet facility

Besides, there are periodicals, journals, weekly and monthly magazines, newspapers, considering the need to keep students abreast with latest development in the field of education, science and technology.

corse.title: Bachelor of Arts
corse.titlePera: Bachelor of Arts (B.A.) is an undergraduate program. Full form of BA (B.A.) is Bachelor of Arts and it comes under the discipline of humanities/arts. The course duration of B.A. Program is 3 year. The program is divided equally into 6 semesters. One having 10+2 degree in any stream can take up this course. There are various B.A. specialisations available namely Philosophy, Literature, Anthropology, Psychology, Theology, Journalism, French, Sanskrit etc and many more.  The program helps in enriching one’s outlook towards society and building it by the oldest forms of arts. Many different specializations available under B.A. subjects makes the course unique and diverse than other main courses. Here, job opportunity is very wide and evergreen. One with good creativity and wanting to explore the different forms of arts can take up the B.A. course. There are various job opportunities provided in various sectors for Bachelor of Arts graduates and B.A. subjects such as Advertising, Law, Public Planning, Graphics and Printing Industry, Journalism are highly career oriented.
corse.programOutcomesPera: Those undergraduates enrolled in our program complete a curriculum that exposes and trains students in a full range of essential skills and abilities. As they near graduation, they will have the opportunity to master the following objective/Knowledge : Gain familiarity with a range of historical subjects that span distinct eras./Recognize how different individuals, groups, organizations, societies, cultures, countries, and nations have interacted in the past and how those interactions have affected history./Gain familiarity with the aims and achievements of different schools of historical thought, practice, and analysis./Develop an appreciation of themselves and of others through the study the past in local, regional, national, and global contexts./Analysis :Learn to evaluate and draw information from the narratives of past events that participants and observers produced./Recognize differences in the methods and techniques of historians and learn how to compare and critique them./Representation :Argue historically and critically in discussions, presentations, and assignments./Practice the methods of historical research, including the development of research topics, the gathering and evaluation of evidence, and the presentation of research findings to a wider audience.
corse.eligibilityCriteria: Candidates must have passed 10+2 or equivalent from a recognized board in India.

laboratories.title: Computer Lab
laboratories.pera: The computer lab provides students hands on experience in various software with high speed internet access. Students get aware of the basics of computer.

laboratories.title: Library & Reading Room
laboratories.pera: The faculty of arts focuses in the overall development and one of the major skills required in this field is the ability of students to adapt to various social dynamics of the students

corse.title: Bachelor of Social Work (BSW)
corse.titlePera: Bachelor of Social Work (B.S.W) is a three-year undergraduate degree that offers knowledge and skills to aspirants to prepare them for a professional career in social welfare BSW enables students to apply their knowledge and consciously applying these practices in the real world to help masses suffering from poverty, violence, mental illness, homelessness, and diseases like AIDS and cancer.  The course is ideal for people who wish to bring the change in society by offering help to the marginalized and unprivileged. BSW help aspirants to develop the required skill sets for solving various economic and social issues.
corse.programOutcomesPera: To enable students to understand history, philosophy, values, ethics and functions of social work profession, and its linkages with other social science disciplines./To equip students with knowledge on core and ancillary methods of professional social work, and its practice base./To make learners- the young professionals sensitive to the needs of the people at individuals, group and community levels and to social problems in changing social, cultural and techno-economic context./To develop young professionals with good communication skills and quest for a self motivated life-long learning, focusing on skilling and re-skilling in their respective field of social work practice./To imbibe in the learners the values of social justice, human rights, empathy, hard and honest work- thereby developing in them the vision to work towards an egalitarian society.
corse.eligibilityCriteria: The candidate shall have passed 10 + 2 examination in any stream (Science/ Commerce/Arts) with English subject from a Statutory Examining Authority.

corse.title: (B.Sc. + M.Sc.) IT IMS & Cloud Technology
corse.titlePera: (B.Sc. + M.Sc.) IT IMS & Cloud Technology is a five-year graduation program executed in 10 semesters..The aim of this program is to impart industry oriented emerging Information technology skills. The student will get proficiency in Network Management, Server Administration, Firewall management and cloud management. The program is designed to fill the gap between industry requirements and academics which will enable student to become industry ready.
corse.programOutcomesPera: Program develops an understanding of latest IT technologies in the field of Information technology infrastructure including cloud. It enables to prepare a complex computer system, connecting it with network, configuring and managing network infrastructure, configure and admin of firewall, windows server admin and Linux server admin, Azure Web Service (AWS) cloud management and Azure cloud management with virtualization.
corse.eligibilityCriteria: Candidates must have passed 10+2 or equivalent from a recognized board in India.

corse.title: (B.Sc. + M.Sc.) IT IMS & Cloud Technology
corse.titlePera: (B.Sc. + M.Sc.) IT IMS & Cloud Technology is a five-year graduation program executed in 10 semesters..The aim of this program is to impart industry oriented emerging Information technology skills. The student will get proficiency in Network Management, Server Administration, Firewall management and cloud management. The program is designed to fill the gap between industry requirements and academics which will enable student to become industry ready.
corse.programOutcomesPera: Program develops an understanding of latest IT technologies in the field of Information technology infrastructure including cloud. It enables to prepare a complex computer system, connecting it with network, configuring and managing network infrastructure, configure and admin of firewall, windows server admin and Linux server admin, Azure Web Service (AWS) cloud management and Azure cloud management with virtualization.
corse.eligibilityCriteria: Candidates must have passed 10+2 or equivalent from a recognized board in India.

corse.title: (B.Sc. + M.Sc.) IT Cyber Security and Digital Forensics
corse.titlePera: It is a five-year graduation program executed in 10 semesters. The aim of this program is to impart industry oriented emerging Information technology skills. The student will get proficiency in Network Management, Server Administration, Ethical Hacking , Penetration Testing, Incident Handling, Cloud Security , Cyber Crime and Cyber law.
corse.programOutcomesPera: Program develops an understanding of latest IT technologies in the field of Information technology infrastructure including cloud. The graduate will be able to articulate and solve problems related to the Cyber Security and Digital Forensics field and can take up interdisciplinary projects. It will prepare entrepreneurs and workforce for the public and private sector in related fields.
corse.eligibilityCriteria: Candidates must have passed 10+2 or equivalent from a recognized board in India.

corse.title: (B.Sc. + M.Sc.) IT Animation, VFX and Game Design
corse.titlePera: (B.Sc. + M.Sc.) IT Animation, VFX and Game Design is a five-year graduation program executed in 10 semesters. The aim of this program is to impart industry oriented emerging Information technology skills. The student will get proficiency in Animation, VFX, Game Design and UI/UX. The program is designed to fill the gap between industry requirements and academics which will enable student to become industry ready.
corse.programOutcomesPera: The program is structured in a unique way to familiarize the students with various approaches, methods and techniques of Animation Technology. It will guide students to develop competencies and skills needed for becoming an effective Animator. The Industry mentor’s skills and knowledge will guide students to master traditional & digital tools to produce stills and moving images. The program gives students an opportunity to explore different approaches in computer animation. The program is designed at par industry and enable students to manage Animation Projects from its Conceptual Stage to the final Product creation. The students will get an opportunity to use their skills in industry and they can pursue their career as a modelling artist, sculpting artist , texture artist, concept artist, rigging artist, vfx artist ,lighting artist, fx artist, compositors, editors.
corse.eligibilityCriteria: Candidates must have passed 10+2 or equivalent from a recognized board in India.

corse.title: Medical Laboratory Technology- Technician (MLT-Technician)
corse.titlePera: Medical Laboratory Technology (Technician) is a one – year programme that includes Six month Theory, Practical and Six month Internship. The course lays a foundation into the aspects of the technologies that are integrated into the healthcare system, which aims in improving the quality of the healthcare system. Diploma in Medical Laboratory Technology (DMLT) concentrates on imparting a thorough knowledge of the diagnosis treatment and prevention of diseases through the use of clinical laboratory Equipment.
corse.programOutcomesPera: After the completion of these course students will be able to perform medical tests with the help of medical instruments and the treatment of diseases. Students will be able to understand instructions of supervisors (Doctors) properly, and will be able to prepare specimen collection material than collection of specimen also the Preservation & transportation of specimen carefully. This program also equips candidates with the knowledge to analyze the specimen with good skill with working accuracy and speed with appropriate safety precaution.
corse.eligibilityCriteria: 12th science pass with biology
